languages.text: "Род Зауэрбэков был одним из первых, прибывших в Простор Коронус. Они веками несли свою службу Императору и никогда до этого не были уличены в неверности — по крайней мере, в официальных источниках. Жаль, что история их рода {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}закончилась{/d}... так".

traits.locale_text: "Род Зауэрбеков был одним из первых, прибывших в Простор Коронус. Они веками несли свою службу Императору и никогда до этого не были уличены в неверности — по крайней мере, в официальных источниках. Жаль, что история их рода закончилась... так. Надеюсь, это станет предостережением для остальных, склонных к ереси аристократов".

languages.text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."
languages.original_text: "Род Зауэрбэков был одним из первых, прибывших в Простор Коронус. Они веками несли свою службу Императору и никогда до этого не были уличены в неверности — по крайней мере, в официальных источниках. Жаль, что история их рода {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}закончилась{/d}... так".

traits.locale_text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Koronus Expanse. They have been serving the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never been incriminated with disloyalty — at least officially. It is quite regrettable that their history was cut short... in such a way."

"The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Koronus Expanse. They have been serving the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never been incriminated with disloyalty — at least officially. It is quite regrettable that their history was cut short... in such a way."

"The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have been serving the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never been found to be disloyal—at least, officially. It is quite regrettable that their history was cut short... in this manner."

"The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have been serving the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never been found to be disloyal—at least, officially. It is quite regrettable that their history was cut short... in this manner."

"The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has ended... in such a manner."

"The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック家はエクスパンスに最初にやってきた一族のひとつでした。何百年と皇帝に仕え続け、不実を働くことなどただの一度もありませんでした…少なくとも、公的な記録には残されていません。その家系が、このような形で{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}滅びる{/d}ことになるとは、非常に残念です」
languages.original_text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック家はエクスパンスに最初にやってきた一族のひとつでした。何百年と皇帝に仕え続け、不実を働くことなどただの一度もありませんでした…少なくとも、公的な記録には残されていません。その家系が、このような形で{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}滅びる{/d}ことになるとは、非常に残念です」

languages.text: “苏尔贝克家族是最早来到科罗努斯扩区的第一批移民者。数百年来，他们始终如一地侍奉帝皇，从未有过任何不忠。或者说，至少官方记载中没有任何相关记录。没想到这个家族的传承……竟以这样的方式就此{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}结束{/d}，这实在是令人遗憾不已。”
languages.original_text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克家族是最早来到科罗努斯扩区的第一批移民者。数百年来，他们始终如一地侍奉帝皇，从未有过任何不忠。或者说，至少官方记载中没有任何相关记录。没想到这个家族的传承……竟以这样的方式就此结束，这实在是令人遗憾不已。”

languages.text: « Les Sauerback ont fait partie des premières familles à rejoindre les Étendues. Ils servent l'Empereur depuis des siècles, et jamais le moindre soupçon de déloyauté n'avait pesé sur eux. Du moins selon les sources officielles. Il est regrettable que leur noble lignée {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}finisse{/d}... de cette manière. »
languages.original_text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."

traits.locale_text: « Les Sauerback ont fait partie des premières familles à rejoindre les Étendues. Ils servent l'Empereur depuis des siècles, et jamais le moindre soupçon de déloyauté n'avait pesé sur eux. Du moins selon les sources officielles. Il est regrettable que leur noble lignée finisse... de cette manière. »

languages.text: «Los Sauerback fueron una de las primeras familias en venir a la Extensión. Han servido al Emperador durante siglos sin ningún indicio de deslealtad... por lo menos, ninguno que conste en fuentes oficiales. Es una tragedia que su noble linaje haya {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}terminado{/d}... de esta manera».
languages.original_text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."

traits.locale_text: «Los Sauerback fueron una de las primeras familias en venir a la Extensión. Han servido al Emperador durante siglos sin ningún indicio de deslealtad... por lo menos, ninguno que conste en fuentes oficiales. Es una tragedia que su noble linaje haya terminado... de esta manera».

languages.text: "Die Sauerbacks waren eine der ersten Familien, die in die Ausdehnung kamen. Sie dienen dem Imperator seit hunderten von Jahren und waren ihm gegenüber noch nie untreu. Jedenfalls nicht laut offiziellen Quellen. Es ist ausgesprochen bedauerlich, dass ihre edle Line ... auf solche Weise {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}enden{/d} musste."
languages.original_text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."

traits.locale_text: "Die Sauerbacks waren eine der ersten Familien, die in die Ausdehnung kamen. Sie dienen dem Imperator seit Jahrhunderten und waren noch nie illoyal. Zumindest nicht offiziell. Es ist bedauerlich, dass ihre Geschichte vorzeitig beendet wurde ... auf diese Weise."

"Die Sauerbacks waren eine der ersten Familien, die in die Ausdehnung kamen. Sie dienen dem Imperator seit hunderten von Jahren und waren ihm gegenüber noch nie untreu. Jedenfalls nicht laut offiziellen Quellen. Es ist ausgesprochen bedauerlich, dass ihre edle Line ... auf solche Weise enden musste."

languages.text: "Sauerback Hanesi, Enginlik'e gelen ilk hanelerden biridir. Asırlarca İmparator'a hizmet etmiş ve resmî kaynaklara göre asla hıyanete kalkışmamışlardır. Soylarının... Böyle bir {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}sonla{/d} kuruması üzücü."
languages.original_text: "The Sauerbacks were one of the first families to come to the Expanse. They have served the Emperor for hundreds of years and have never shown any signs of disloyalty — at least, none recorded in any official sources. It is quite regrettable that their noble line has {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d}... in such a manner."

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback Hanesi, Enginlik'e gelen ilk hanelerden biri olmuştur. Asırlarca İmparator'a hizmet etmiş ve resmî kaynaklara göre asla hıyanete kalkışmamıştır. Soylarının... böyle bir {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}sonla{/d} kuruması üzücü."
